About Knock-Knock Joke Dispenser How about some Puns?

Pun Sayer

Hello! I don't have anything to interact with to obtain these terrible puns, but I want to come back here in my own time later. In the meantime I have prepared a variety of lovely HTML lists.

Call-and-Response Puns

Why is it hard to explain puns to a kleptomaniac?
They always take things literally......
Why did I throw that clock out the window?
I wanted to see time fly......
What's the best place to take a cow on a date?
To the moooovies.......

Unprompted Puns

  • Good steak puns are a rare medium well-done.
  • I've always found skeleton puns quite humerus.
